Class.name: EntryPathExtensions
Class.summary: Provides extension methods for working with entry paths, such as directories and files.

Static.name: DirectoryIO
Static.summary: Gets the instance associated with the directory specified by the entry path.

Static.name: FileIO
Static.summary: Gets the instance associated with the file specified by the entry path.

Static.name: GetEntryType[EntryPath]
Static.summary: Gets the type of the entry specified by the entry path (either file or directory).
Static.returns: A value indicating whether the entry is a file, directory, or does not exist.

Static.name: ToFileInfo[EntryPath]
Static.summary: Converts the entry path to a instance, providing file-related information and operations.
Static.returns: A instance representing the specified file.

Static.name: ToDirectoryInfo[EntryPath]
Static.summary: Converts the entry path to a instance, providing directory-related information and operations.
Static.returns: A instance representing the specified directory.
